thread.title: DeNA, Haseko to be included in Nikkei 225 average - Nikkei
thread.title_full: DeNA, Haseko to be included in Nikkei 225 average - Nikkei | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DeNA, Haseko to be included in Nikkei 225 average - Nikkei
text:
TOKYO, Sept 4 DeNa and Haseko Corp will be included in Japan's benchmark stock index, the Nikkei 225 average, while Nitto Boseki and Heiwa Real Estate will be dropped, the Nikkei said on Friday.
The changes will take place on Oct 1. (Reporting by Hideyuki Sano ; Editing by Clarence Fernandez)
